abstract: The approval of China and Russia is still needed for Oracle to complete its takeover of Sun Microsystems.
snippet: The approval of China and Russia is still needed for Oracle to complete its takeover of Sun Microsystems.
lead_paragraph: The European Commission said Thursday that it had approved Oracle’s $7.4 billion takeover of Sun Microsystems after concluding that it would not significantly affect competition in the European Union.

headline.main: Oracle’s Acquisition of Sun Wins Approval of Europeans
headline.print_headline: Oracle’s Acquisition of Sun Wins Approval of Europeans

abstract: Oracle’s co-president, Charles Phillips, acknowledges an affair after some unusual billboards featuring him appear in Times Square and elsewhere.
snippet: Oracle’s co-president, Charles Phillips, acknowledges an affair after some unusual billboards featuring him appear in Times Square and elsewhere.
lead_paragraph: Update | 9:20 a.m.  Adding credit to Gawker and the apparent motivation for the creation of the billboards.Update | 10:58 a.m. Correcting Charles Phillips’s title.

headline.main: Oracle President Admits Affair After Billboards Appear
